version_description:
- Improved audio engine.
- Fixes for non 3D Touch devices.

ＭΛＪＯＲ ＵＰＤΛＴΞＳ
◦ Overhaul of audio system (improved sound clarity and audio performance)
◦ Sound now dynamically optimizes based on listening device (internal speaker, headphones, or external speakers)
◦ New sound generators.
◦ Audio continues after switching to a Bluetooth device mid-session.
◦ Significantly optimized CPU usage (better battery life, device temperature)
◦ Fix for day / night cycle in multiple countries.
